title: Your pictures on the theme of 'barriers'
description: A selection of striking images from our readers around the world.

title: Kansas: The state where abortion is on the ballot
description: Opposing sides are in a close race to decide whether women in Kansas have the right to abortion.

title: 'I adopt wobbly cats'
description: A woman who adopts disabled cats wants more people to consider adopting.

title: Beach body ad edited out my prosthetic leg, model says
description: Sian Green-Lord said the Spanish government campaign also used her photos without permission.

title: Commonwealth Games: Duncan Scott beats Tom Dean to freestyle gold after Ben Proud wins butterfly gold
description: Scotland's Duncan Scott passes England's Tom Dean to take a sensational 200m freestyle Commonwealth gold.

title: Camp Bestival 2022: Dancers beat world disco record
description: Sophie Ellis-Bextor leads almost 600 dancers as they boogie their way into the record books.

title: Lilia Valutyte: Suspect photos released after girl, 9, stabbed
description: Police say they "urgently" want to question the man over nine-year-old Lilia Valutyte's death.

title: Commonwealth Games: Sophie Unwin left in tears after not being awarded bronze medal despite third-place finish
description: England's Sophie Unwin was left in tears after she was not awarded a Commonwealth Games bronze medal despite placing third in the tandem B sprint.

title: Three teenagers killed in car crash in North Yorkshire
description: North Yorkshire Police confirm three male passengers have died and the driver is seriously injured.

title: Ex-health secretaries call for urgent blood scandal payouts
description: The government must compensate victims of the scandal immediately, three former health secretaries say.

title: Commonwealth Games 2022: Kenya carry Australia player Corey Toole over touchline
description: Watch as Kenya players carry Australia's Corey Toole over the touchline in the men's rugby Sevens match at the Commonwealth Games.

title: Rusty Bowers defied Donald Trump - what happens now?
description: The political fate of a "nobody" Republican will reveal a lot about the ex-president's future too.

title: Gazprom stops Latvia's gas in latest Russian cut to EU
description: The EU rejects Russia's demand that member states pay for Gazprom gas in roubles, not euros.

title: Greggs: Bakery fails in bid for 24-hour Leicester Square store
description: A council says the chain's plans for its West End store to stay open all night are "half-baked".

title: James Maddison: Leicester reject Newcastle's £40m bid for playmaker
description: Leicester reject a £40m bid from Newcastle for playmaker James Maddison.

title: Hungarian Grand Prix: Red Bull and Porsche could work together - Christian Horner
description: Red Bull team principal Christian Horner admits that the team could join forces with Porsche in Formula 1 in the future.

title: Ukraine war: UN and Red Cross should investigate prison deaths, says Ukraine
description: The prisoners of war were killed in a prison camp in the occupied part of Donetsk region.

title: Commonwealth Games: David Weir punctures as Johnboy Smith wins Men's T53/54 Wheelchair Marathon gold
description: England's Johnboy Smith wins the Men's T53/54 Wheelchair Marathon after compatriot David Weir suffers a puncture when leading.

title: Viking-age treasure hoard goes on show in Aberdeen
description: The Galloway Hoard continues to surprise experts and new discoveries can be seen in Aberdeen.

title: The Ukrainians living on a cruise ship in Edinburgh
description: More than 100 Ukraine refugees are being temporarily housed on the MS Victoria.

title: 'Witness protection threw my life into turmoil'
description: Reece was 11 when his mother was a witness in a murder investigation, which led to years of turmoil.

title: Commonwealth Games 2022: Johnboy Smith wins gold after David Weir's puncture
description: Watch as England's Johnboy Smith wins gold in the T53/54 Wheelchair Marathon after eight-time London Marathon winner David Weir suffers a puncture when leading.

title: Pride jersey controversy - a reckoning for Australian sport?
description: A boycott by seven rugby league players over a pride jersey has sparked a massive backlash.

title: The Pope's health: I could step down - but not yet, says pontiff
description: He was speaking on the way home from a trip to the Canada, where he apologised to indigenous people.

title: DJ Ace: 1Xtra presenter wants to talk about live organ donation
description: Radio 1Xtra's DJ Ace says more black and Asian people need to be aware they can donate while living.

title: Shauna Lennon: From wheelchair to walking on stage at graduation
description: University student Shauna Lennon from County Tyrone was involved a serious car accident last year.

title: Train strikes: 'I cycled 33 miles to get to a gig'
description: Many people's travel plans have been disrupted but some aren't willing to let train strikes get in their way.

title: Euro 2022 final: Georgia Stanway says England's men have made ticket requests
description: Georgia Stanway says the England men's team have been in touch, giving advice and looking for Euro 2022 final tickets.

title: The Papers: Truss 'heads for No 10' and 'Coleen plots revenge'
description: Saturday's papers report that Liz Truss is making gains in the Conservative leadership contest.

title: Migrant deaths: How an American dream ended in horror
description: Funerals are being held for some of the 53 migrants who died in a van in the sweltering heat in Texas.

title: Winland Academy caught hiring writers for uni applications
description: A social mobility charity expresses alarm at adverts for people to write personal statements.
